org.fridlund.backman.entities

Class GhostGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.backman.entities.GhostGraphics

  • public class GhostGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the animation for the Ghost entity. This way you can assign the same graphics to several different Ghost AI.
